mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.comments, a.favors, a.belong_group, a.images, a.last_image_id, a.create_time, a.views, a.title, a.tags, a.summary, u.id "user.id", u.nick_name "user.nickName", u.avatar "user.avatar", group_concat( CONCAT( ac.id, '---', ac.original, '---', ac.preview, '---', ac.store ) SEPARATOR '===' ) accessorys, a.featured FROM t_favors f LEFT JOIN t_article a ON f.article_id = a.id LEFT JOIN t_article_accessory ac ON ac.to_id = a.id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.id = a.author_id WHERE f.own_id = #{userId} AND a.`status` = 10 GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY f.create_time DESC
